core.log_level.label: Log level
core.log_level.tooltip: Which logs should be shown in the logs tab?

core.prefix.enable.label: Prefix enable
core.prefix.enable.tooltip: Whether or not commands use a prefix (like a bot name: !lucky gamble or !gamble)

core.prefix.text.label: Prefix
core.prefix.text.tooltip: The bot prefix (All commands have to start with a ! so a command would look like !yourprefix gamble)

core.permission.value.label: Global Permission
core.permission.value.tooltip: Who is able to use the bot in general

core.permission.info.label: Global permission info
core.permission.info.tooltip:
This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.
Use user, rank or tier

core.all_keyword.label: All keyword
core.all_keyword.tooltip: Keyword to indicate the user wants to gamble all of his currency

core.text.help.value: Available commands: {gamble.command}, {guess.command}, {d20.command}, {jackpot.command}. For more information on a command type {core.help.command} [keyword]. To view the disclaimer type {disclaimer.command}.
core.text.help.label: Help text
core.text.help.tooltip:
Help text shown when using the help command.
Available formats are:
	{gamble.command} (gamble command),
	{guess.command} (guess command),
	{d20.command} (d20 command),

	{jackpot.command} (jackpot command),
	{core.help.command} (help command),
	{disclaimer.command} (disclaimer command)

core.text.no_permission.value: You have no permission to use the bot, {user}.
core.text.no_permission.label: No permission text
core.text.no_permission.tooltip:
Text shown when user attempts to use the bot without permission to do so.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.no_command_permission.value: You have no permission to use the {keyword} command, {user}.
core.text.no_command_permission.label: No command permission text
core.text.no_command_permission.tooltip:
Text shown when user attempts to use a command without permission to do so.
Available formats are:
	{keyword} (the keyword the user tried to use),
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.command_disable.label: Command disable text
core.text.command_disable.tooltip:
Text shown when user attempts to use disabled command.
Available formats are:
	{keyword} (the keyword the user tried to use),
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.malformed_command.value: I did not get that, {user}. Type {core.help.command} for help and try again.
core.text.malformed_command.label: Malformed command text
core.text.malformed_command.tooltip:
Text shown when user tries to use the bot but the command is not recognized.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{core.help.command} (help command)

core.text.not_enough_currency.value: You don't have enough {currency} to do this, {user}.
core.text.not_enough_currency.label: Not enough currency text
core.text.not_enough_currency.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble more than he owns.
Available formats are:
	{currency} (currency name),
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.on_cooldown.value: {keyword} is still on cooldown for {cooldown} seconds, {user}
core.text.on_cooldown.label: Command on cooldown text
core.text.on_cooldown.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to use a command but is on cooldown.
Available formats are:
	{keyword} (the keyword used)

	{cooldown} (the cooldown in seconds),

	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.twitch_bug.value: Please close the whisper chat with the 'X' and reopen it after replying to see new messages from me (that's a nice twitch but isn't it?).
core.text.twitch_bug.label: Twitch whisper bug text
core.text.twitch_bug.tooltip: Text appended to all whisper messages as this is a twitch bug and quite annoying

disclaimer.enable.label: Disclaimer enable
disclaimer.enable.tooltip: Whether or not to require acknowledgment of the gambling disclaimer before gambling

disclaimer.via_whisper.label: Disclaimer via whisper
disclaimer.via_whisper.tooltip: Whether or not to conclude disclaimer acknowledgement via whisper message

disclaimer.text.disclaimer_via_whisper.value: You need to send this message via whisper, {user}
disclaimer.text.disclaimer_via_whisper.label: Disclaimer via whisper message
disclaimer.text.disclaimer_via_whisper.tooltip:
Text shown when disclaimer via whisper is enable but user tries to use those commands in stream chat.
Available formats:
	{user} (mentions the user)

disclaimer.text.disclaimer.value: Gambling can be addictive. Play responsibly. Underage gambling is an offence. Type {core.acknowledge.command} to acknowledge this disclaimer.
disclaimer.text.disclaimer.label: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text.disclaimer.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble more than he owns.
Available formats are:
	{core.acknowledge.command} (command to acknowledge the disclaimer)

disclaimer.text.disable.label: Disclaimer disable text
disclaimer.text.disable.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble more than he owns.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user)

disclaimer.text.acknowledged.label: Acknowledged text
disclaimer.text.acknowledged.tooltip:
Text shown when a user acknowledges the disclaimer.
Available formats are:
	{gamble.keyword} (gamble keyword),
	{guess.keyword} (guess keyword),
	{user} (mentions the user)

disclaimer.text.not_acknowledged.value: I'm sorry {user} but you need to accept the disclaimer first to {gamble.keyword} or {guess.keyword}. Type {disclaimer.command} to display it.
disclaimer.text.not_acknowledged.label: Disclaimer not acknowledged text
disclaimer.text.not_acknowledged.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble before acknowledging the disclaimer.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{gamble.keyword} (gamble keyword),

	{guess.keyword} (guess keyword),

	{disclaimer.command} (disclaimer command)

jackpot.enable.label: Jackpot enable
jackpot.enable.tooltip: Whether or not to enable the jackpot

jackpot.keyword.tooltip: Keyword used to display the jackpot

jackpot.number.label: Jackpot number
jackpot.number.tooltip: Number to roll to get the jackpot. Must be between 1 and 100

jackpot.percentage.label: Jackpot entry percentage
jackpot.percentage.tooltip: How much of a users loss to add to the jackpot (added = entry * percentage / 100)

jackpot.decay.enable.tooltip: Whether or not the jackpot decays

jackpot.decay.seconds.tooltip: Seconds till the an entry in the jackpot decays

jackpot.decay.minutes.label: Jackpot decay minutes

jackpot.decay.hours.label: Jackpot decay hours
jackpot.decay.hours.tooltip: Hours till the an entry in the jackpot decays

jackpot.text.content.label: Jackpot content text
jackpot.text.content.tooltip:
Text displayed when a user uses the jackpot keyword.
Available formats are:
	{jackpot.sum} (coins in the jackpot),

	{currency} (currency name),

	{user} (mentions the user)

jackpot.text.win.value: {user} rolled {roll} and won the jackpot ({jackpot.sum} {currency})! He has {total} {currency} now.
jackpot.text.win.label: Jackpot win text
jackpot.text.win.tooltip:
Text displayed when a user wins the jackpot.

Available formats are:

	{user} (mentions the user),

	{roll} (the users roll),

	{jackpot.sum} (coins in the jackpot),

	{currency} (the currency name),

	{total} (users total coins)

jackpot.text.help.value: Type {jackpot.command} to view the jackpot. Jackpot can be won by rolling {jackpot.number} while gambling.
jackpot.text.help.label: Jackpot help text
jackpot.text.help.tooltip:
Jackpot help text.

Available formats are:

	{jackpot.command} (jackpot command),

	{jackpot.number} (Number to win jackpot)
